chap

noun:

(informal) a man or boy; fellow; gentleman

away

adverb:

to or at a distance from a particular place or person.

What we're about

We provide classic, authentic, quality travel items from a by-gone era.

Travelling away from home could be anything from a quick Sunday walk around your estate, through to circumnavigating the globe!

We aim to supply anything that you might need for such adventures away from home, from a waterproof canvas bag to a gentlemans wash kit.

We at Chaps Away are tired of modern materials that are not built to last. We source vintage items that not only look amazing but are robust and functional.

Neil and Oliver

Featured Products

No.1 Vintage Messenger Bag

Vintage cotton canvas messenger bag with leather retaining tags. We have added custom made leather pouches to either side of the pockets that have additional belt loops. The front of the messenger bag folds down for effortless access to it's contents. We at Chaps Away are tired of modern materials that are not built to last. We source vintage items that not only look amazing but are robust and functional.

Vintage and built to last.

Beautiful leather retaining loops.

Once the leather retaining loops are freed the front drops down to give full access. No rummaging here!

Custom leather pouch.

Our Officers Wash Roll.

A true Gentleman's Wash Roll to neatly place all the essential items a Gentleman may take with him. At Chaps Away we are tired of wash bags and loose shaving kits. We have designed a true gentleman's Wash Roll to neatly place all the essential items a gentleman may take with him. Hand made in the Cotswolds using 100% natural cotton. Hand made and stitched brown leather straps with solid brass buckles and D ring for hanging the wash roll.

Beautiful brass D ring to hang the Wash Roll.

Hand Stitched leather and brass.

Classic, vintage design.

Our Wash Roll is supplied with a military grade stainless steel highly polished mirror that will not smash!

Traditional Shaving

Do it the old fashioned way with a quality, British made, razor. As good today as it was then.

Ever ready 1912 solid brass razor. Bakelite case.

Vintage Ever Ready 1912 brass razor.
